website_summaries.verdict: These individually-wrapped Sour Patch Kids are perfect for sharing.
pros: The Sour Patch Kids here are roughly 3 times the size of regular ones
The individual wrapping keeps the candies fresh, helps with portion control, and encourages sharing at work or at school
Great kids snack or party favor
cons: With all the plastic, it's not the most eco-friendly packaging

customer_reviews.title: ONE single Sour Patch Kid per pouch ☹️
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thinking they were small snack-sized packs. However they are literally packaged individually....as in ONE single Sour Patch Kid per pouch!!! Seems like a bit of a waste. But the product inside is delicious as expected. After reading several other reviews having problems with open packaging and unsanitary exposed or partial candy inside, I was sure to inspect the wrapping very carefully. All the kids were fully intact and all individual wrapping was secure. No problems at all with the product. But knowing that they are packaged individually and not in small packs means I won’t be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Individual wrap is convenient
customer_reviews.text: Love these individually wrapped sour patch kids. They are larger than the standard size that comes in typical packaging, but they are approximately 5g of carbs each which is perfect for treating low blood sugars for my type 1 daughter. The individual wrapping makes it super convenient to carry a few in my purse, in the car, my pocket, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great Treat For The Office Sweet Tooth
customer_reviews.text: My co-workers and staff love stopping by my office to grab a couple Big Sour Patch Kids instead of buying an entire box or bag of regular Sour Patch Kids and overindulging. I've ordered three boxes so far, one was crushed during shipping but was quickly replaced by Amazon. We haven't experienced any issues with the actual candies themselves but the display box isn't terribly sturdy. The opening for dispensing the candy is flimsy (aka easy to tear) but if you're careful it should open without too much difficulty. As long as the price and quality remains reasonable I will continue to re-purchase these monthly for my office.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas R. HerumTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Individually Wrapped is Not the Way to Go
customer_reviews.text: My batch of Sour Patch Kids were victims of a factory packaging accident. Many of my kids were sliced in half and running around loose inside the box and it was a sugary, sticky mess inside. Also, they just don’t taste like the ones you buy in a bag from the gas station.
customer_reviews.author: Disco Flies

customer_reviews.title: They're sour patch kids.  You probably know by now if you like them.
customer_reviews.text: My only issue is that they're individually wrapped, which is a bit of a pain, and pretty wasteful. But that;s my own fault for not looking at the product image or description. I saw "Big Sour Patch Kids" and just clicked "Buy" like it was instinct. Still insanely good. And sour. And patchy. Maybe not that last one. If you love sour patch kids, you'll still love them when they're bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Moren

customer_reviews.title: Candy packaging seal a lot of pressure on the candy ...
customer_reviews.text: Candy packaging seal a lot of pressure on the candy, can not eat, there are a lot of plastic debris.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Liang

customer_reviews.title: I don't like these, but the children do! Bought them for Halloween.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like these, but the children do! Bought them for Halloween for $12.49, which comes to about 5 cents apiece. Our street is popular and the head count is about 450 trick-or-treaters during the evening of Oct. 31. I buy all the candy in bulk. At a cost of 5 cent each or less, it's easy to let each child choose two different items, and keep the cost under $50. I had a bin of your basic chocolates, too (Milky Way, Snickers, M&Ms, etc.), but the favorites among the kiddies were the Sour Patch Kids and Skittles.
customer_reviews.author: Sligo McKluge

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought three boxes these sour patch kids for my daughter to give out for her student government campaign. I was disappointed when they came and were individual sour patch kids, but that was the least of our worries. One of the boxes we ordered was full of the victims of a factory mishap. There were halved, sticky sour patch kids everywhere, and probably only around 30 intact or salvageable ones in the whole box. The other box we bought was fine, but the last one also had the same problem. Do not buy these if you want intact ones.
customer_reviews.author: klpotter

customer_reviews.title: Love the individual wrapping and that they don't melt!
customer_reviews.text: I love these for parties as they are individually wrapped. I also appreciate that they do not melt in the shipping / delivery process. I love them for a good party to have out in a bowl or use for party favors etc. You can easily save the ones you do not use. They are much larger than your standard sour patch kids size so perfect bite / snack size.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Just as they should be - great!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Great mix of colors, and even better, it tastes as I remember! I've been disappointed recently over the many online orders of candy and snacks that seem to be made with different ingredients than those you buy in shops, or recipes that have been cheapened over time. These are about as I remembered! Each color tastes substantially different justifying those who like "only the blues", or like me, everything buy the blues. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kit10

customer_reviews.title: Those without self control, stay away!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you'd like to avoid putting yourself into a sour patch kids food coma, then don't buy these. I think I ate this whole box in like two weeks and became borderline diabetic. Delicious, but please be warned. They are too good and addictive.
customer_reviews.author: jesusu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size to carry around for a quick treat
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these treats to hand out to Elementary aged children I work with as a reward for good behavior. These were perfect! I've always loved Sour Patch Kids, but these are different in terms of size...different in a good way (these are not the standard Sour Patch candies found in the grocery store or movie theater. These are single Sour Patch kids in a larger size individually wrapped)! They are the perfect snack and because each individual serving is tiny, it is easy to control sugar intake. Oh yeah, and the kids loved them too!
customer_reviews.author: Runner

customer_reviews.title: Many Candy Pieces Out of Wrapper
customer_reviews.text: This product was to be used in a church class; while some of the candy is wrapped, about a third of it is partially wrapped or unwrapped. See photo. I would not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon R. Hall

customer_reviews.title: There are a lot in the container.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for Easter & it arrived with a ton of the candies individually wrapped. They were packed in the container so we received more then we will need for months. Having the candies individually wrapped is great so they do not dry our and become hard. I was very impressed with how economical these candies were considering how many you actually receive.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S.

customer_reviews.title: Great candy for birthday parties or pinatas!
customer_reviews.text: The candy came exactly as described! There were 224 pieces in the box I received (yes, I counted them), so I'm happy with the quantity. There were no smashed candies or opened wrappers, as some other reviews have said. The flavor is good; the only issue is the candy is not as soft as I expected. It seems a little harder than the smaller sour patch kids; but overall I am still happy with the product. For those of you wondering about expiration dates, I received this product today and the expiration date is 03/13/2020.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect packaging for the times!
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to see these! Even inside family these days, we don't like to use the same bowl or bag for snacks and put our hands in them, we just want to be careful and safe and clean. This is perfect for that! each piece of candy is individually wrapped, making it perfect for giving away or sharing. Great price per ounce as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Grelewicz

customer_reviews.title: not completely closed package
customer_reviews.text: I am very dissatisfied with the sour patch kids candy. They come individual which is fine but i bought for trick or treat and most of the little packages are open with what looks like poor packaging there are many not in the plastic so those cant be given out and neither can any that aren't fully closed packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: OPEN WRAPPERS AND MOLD???
customer_reviews.text: Sour patch kids are delicious, when I got the box I ate a few and noticed they were opened slightly which I figured was normal since there’s so many loose pieces, but the pieces of black dots on the candy??? No idea what it is, I’m not gonna waste my time to get my 10$ back but I want everyone to be aware when you get these to check them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Love sour patch kids, and this one is great for an office or to share!!
customer_reviews.text: This is not the typical sour patch kids package. If you read this carefully, It is larger candies, with each sour patch kid being about the size of 3 of the typical sour patch kids. Each is individually wrapped and the box opens to make a great counter top dispenser. This is fantastic for my office, as it has a built in portion control as they are individually wrapped and it make it sanitary to eat. Unfortunately we have one of those guys known to never wash his hands in the restroom who loves to grab food straight out of bowls with his hands.....he thinks we are all on diets as we never touch anything after he does...
customer_reviews.author: C. J.

customer_reviews.title: Way too hard no stars
customer_reviews.text: Not only were they not chewy...they're so hard my jaw hurt just trying to chew them Way harder then the last box I ordered I guess I'll just have to stick to buying them in the store At least that way I'll be able to tell if they're actually chewy The only thing is,the general stores don't have the big ones I don't recommend these I had to give a star just to submit the review Really sketchy!!! NO STAR
customer_reviews.author: Toi

customer_reviews.title: and the size of each single serving is like a larger version of the original
customer_reviews.text: The box is convenient so you create no trash, break the sides open and it creates a standing candy distributor. The candies are packaged individually so you can take it on the go or help yourself with portion control, you can also choose the color since they packaging is clear. The flavors are assorted, the candy tastes the same as the usual ones that came in the packs, and the size of each single serving is like a larger version of the original..I guess like a sour patch adult lol.
customer_reviews.author: Kris NT

customer_reviews.title: And it helps us control our intake as well because who doesn’t love sour patch kids
customer_reviews.text: These are giant sour patch kids, a whole box of them. We find it easier to monitor our child’s candy intake when we can give them one individually wrapped sour patch kid rather than a quantity of small ones from a larger package. And it helps us control our intake as well because who doesn’t love sour patch kids. I bet you can’t just have one when you buy the box/bag of small ones. These individually wrapped ones, while larger, give us the self-control to only have one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Just for the kid in me!
customer_reviews.text: Aside for the fact that these are deliciously wonderful...they are individually wrapped with clear plastic!! Which is awesome because whatever I carry into work must be in a clear wrapper/container. Oh and I love the size of these...in fact...I hear one or three calling me right now!! : )
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Individually wrapped and even better than the regular size version
customer_reviews.text: I generally avoid food dyes, but got these for a birthday. They are soft and delicious - softer and chewier than the regular sized sour patch kids. I love that they are individually wrapped because I generally only eat one of them.
customer_reviews.author: RANG

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I just received my box of sour patch kids! I was so excited! Until I saw the box...it looks like someone tried to snatch a few before they got delivered to my house. The box is all mangled and sadly open! Not happy with the delivery or presentation! The freshness of these sour patch kids is so gross! Hard as rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Patti OBRIEN

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I work with a ton of students, and the fact that these are individually wrapped is a lifesaver. They’re not phenomenal with portion control and are not amazing with hygiene, so their larger size and single portion helps keep their candy consumption reasonable. The container shape makes it easy to replace them with no-mess, and keep track of how many are left
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Purchased these before going back to Asia
customer_reviews.text: These sour patch kids, or at least the box I got, were horrible. They tasted like chemicals and I ended up tossing them. There was something definitely wrong with them. On another note, the large bags that are not individually wrapped were awesome. I'm glad I bought two of those and only one box of these.
customer_reviews.author: iamtheceo

customer_reviews.title: Fill the candy jar for work
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to fill a candy jar, but had so many left over that I took to work to share them. These are great for the work environment since they are individually wrapped...don't have to worry about people reaching into candy container and grabbing the unwrapped variety of sour patch kids when you have no idea if co-worker washed hands or not before grabbing a treat! My co-workers are loving these. They also remain fresh longer due to the packaging. Bonus larger size too. Will be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: scole1124

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to bring to work, and everyone loves them! They seem like a bit of a waste, since each candy is individually wrapped, but sanitary! The flavors are as good as the bagged originals, with about an equal amount of each.
customer_reviews.author: Ariss McKalynn

customer_reviews.title: Just as shown! Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd time I’ve ordered and I’m still so pleased. They arrive in the big box shown and it’s not opened or damaged the candy isn’t melted. Perfect! I get these as treats for my 7th graders! They love them! Will be back to purchase more
customer_reviews.author: Saara

customer_reviews.title: Nice size. One is all you need.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. I thought I was buying the packages of the smaller version of these sour patch but I was pleasantly surprised when I opened it and found out how large they are. You only need one to satisfy that sweet and sour tooth.
customer_reviews.author: Tapred

customer_reviews.title: More expensive than standard packaging, but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sour patch I’ve ever had and the whole office agrees! The individual wrapping and larger size must maintain the flavor and freshness better because these taste so much better than when you buy the standard packaged ones. I even enjoy eating the flavors that I normally don’t now! Must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Beck

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my boyfriend as a gift and he loved it! It's his favorite candy. However, since they are individually wrapped this produces so much waste and garbage. I personally won't be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to buy a decent supply of the "Big Sour Patch Kids" (I won't go back to the regular ones after discovering these), but didn't want that big 2.5-pound bag, as I swear those zipper bags don't always hold up. Not only was this a good price for the amount you get, but each candy being individually wrapped is super convenient. The box they come in is also very practical.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Sour Patch Kids were a hit
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to give out for Halloween. Big hit and very reasonably priced. I wanted to give out something different than the usual grocery store fare and I remembered how my students loved these things. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: mimzy

customer_reviews.title: Candy wrappers not sealed close
customer_reviews.text: Almost all of the individually wrapped wrappers were open or almost all the way open with candy falling out! What is the point of buying them individually wrapped if they aren’t even sealed? Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Ams81

customer_reviews.title: Its great if you want to use them as singular treats ...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you order, and here's what it is. Slightly larger sour patch kids, about 2.5x a normal sour patch kid size maybe. Its great if you want to use them as singular treats but if you're going to eat a bunch it'd probably be better to buy a big bag that is not individually wrapped. I won't be buying this again but it was delicious and if this is what you want then i suggest you buy it because it was THE BOMB!
customer_reviews.author: 20-something fit gamer male

customer_reviews.title: Bad batches
customer_reviews.text: I love these normally, but my first box the candy had a chemical taste that lasted a second, but nonetheless, was horrible tasting. I notified Amazon who sent me another box, and the same thing. I had my husband try them to make sure it wasn't me, and he agreed there was a chemical taste when the candy first hits your tongue. So I tried 2 separate boxes and they both tasted like chemical. I went to the store and bought a few (Party City) and they tasted fine. I've loved these candies forever but not this time!
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Packaging great! Pretty fresh but after like a month on having them they did get a little hard. I am a teacher and bought them as treats. Kids loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Jen b

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I used these as Christmas stocking candy. BIG HIT. Each candy is individually wrapped so they last well and work to just toss in the stockings. I will be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: B Porter

customer_reviews.title: Stale
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how a box of individually wrapped candy could end up this stale. Very disappointing, as one of my favorites that I had planned to take on a trip with me. At least I can leave them outside in a bowl for trick or treaters instead.
customer_reviews.author: snakebitepsycho

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for a teen
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this as part of a gift for my 14 year old nephew. He loved it! I liked how the box could also be used as a dispenser as well. The candy was fresh, and I really liked how it was individually wrapped large sour patch kids.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Conveniently Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Sour Patch Kids for the whole family. This item conveniently packages each larger sized candy so that you can grab and go. Several flavors to keep your taste buds happy. This is eaten by the kids to the grandparents. Enjoy in moderarion
customer_reviews.author: Talia

customer_reviews.title: Tasty but not packaged properly
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Unfortunately there appears to be something wrong with the sealing process during manufacturing. In the first box I received, only about 25% of the candies were properly sealed. The other 75% we opened in some way. Some of them got caught in the seal and had tuned into a sticky mess in the box. I thought it might be a one-off, so I got a replacement box. This box was no different than the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Carikiwi

customer_reviews.title: EACH PIECE of candy is wrapped individually- not fun-size packages!
customer_reviews.text: These were fine- except I did not realize that they were individually wrapped pieces! Probably my mistake, but I was expecting little packages- like you buy for Halloween, etc. I didn’t expect rack piece of candy to be individually wrapped, which made them less of a good deal than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Boys'TownMama

customer_reviews.title: Great freshness and cheap
customer_reviews.text: I use these for rewards for kids in my therapy practice and due to Covid these are great b/c of the sanity.. They are fresh too.
customer_reviews.author: skyeeeo

customer_reviews.title: Yummy bite sizes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to add to gift bags & glad the box was a 250 count, as I could not stop eating these. These are a perfect bite size of sour candy goodness (a little over an inch).
customer_reviews.author: Yves

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!!!
customer_reviews.text: I toss these to my students when they answer questions correctly and they loooveee them! They taste better bigger!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Klug

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe some people received bad batches (saying they were hard), but the package I received was soft just as Sour Patch are! I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Greatness
customer_reviews.text: Awesome buy. Mine were all fresh. Some packaging was a little off but not enough to mess up the candy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and taste better than the smaller ones
customer_reviews.text: I like how these are individually wrapped .They tasye better than the smaller sour patch kids.
customer_reviews.author: KLeeAllen

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it. Although the flavors are a bit strong according to them.
customer_reviews.author: I.E. Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! Put a small handful of these in all of the kid's stockings in our family for gifts and had so many leftover I put them in the adult's stockings, too! The first thing my daughter's boyfriend said when he opened his, "it has blue!!" so I guess that's good? haha
customer_reviews.author: Stacy G.

customer_reviews.title: Good...good...good
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved them should have bought more...they were trying to swap my candy for what was in their own bags...too funny... I'll buy more next year... I ran out...
customer_reviews.author: Da_Craphter

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my candy jar where we are mostly people I work with are in their 20s and they all love them
customer_reviews.author: Meribeth Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Halloween.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, but keep in mind you get ONE large sour patch kid per package. There arent small packages of multiples. Not many trick or treaters seemed to want them?? It was fairly surprising. Its okay, I ate them :")
customer_reviews.author: mea

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: These say they are big but they aren’t really that big. They are small. It’s not worth what I paid for it. They taste good but definitely not what I was expecting. The only thing that is big is the box.
customer_reviews.author: RealCriticReviews

customer_reviews.title: BIG flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and individually wrapped so no worries of them sticking together. My hair stylist loves these soooo much that she is happy to accept them as part of her tip!
customer_reviews.author: Mary  K Tingblad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Halloween and leftovers
customer_reviews.text: These candies worked well for Halloween. We purchased them in conjunction with the equivalent Swedish Fish box from Amazon, and handed trick-or-treaters one of each. I liked that they arrived in a box instead of a crinkling, collapsible bag. As I've consumed the leftovers, I've also come to appreciate the fact that they are individually wrapped, because it slows down my snacking compared to fruit-snack sized packages you can buy which have several candies per pack.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Hard to come across at a lot price
customer_reviews.text: They a delicious, problem is they are hard to come across at a low price. Keep an eye for vendors selling them at a cheap price and get them while you can.
customer_reviews.author: Juanes

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. Person loves sour patch kids and these are perfect to grab just a few at a time without opening a whole bag. They are individually wrapped.
customer_reviews.author: Wise2007

customer_reviews.title: Favorite size and packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Great value, super fresh! I really like that it’s the 2x the size and individuality wrapped.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Big?
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what’s the “big” part?? These are regular ole sour patch kids. Each tiny bear individually wrapped.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my son classmates. I made them end of the school year bags. They loved them. Will be purchasing these again for this school year.
customer_reviews.author: DIMPLES

customer_reviews.title: Yum!!
customer_reviews.text: My students love these and I use then as little incentives. Individually wrapped keeps them fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome taste 🤗
customer_reviews.text: Thanks even though the boxs was open! The items was ok!
customer_reviews.author: carolyn wright

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Large sized sour patch kids. Single and individually wrapped. So its not small bags with multiple. Great easter egg stuffers! Wish these cane in the tropical flavors!!!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Vega

customer_reviews.title: Delivery took longer than advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly what you expect with sour candies. My disappointment was the delivery. Although the original order gave a window of delivery that would have worked for my event, the actual delivery took almost two full weeks. These have now been downgraded to Halloween candy.
customer_reviews.author: AkaRoc

customer_reviews.title: individual sour kids!
customer_reviews.text: I do NOT expect them to be individual pieces! Maybe I read the description wrong? but no worries I still used them in my Halloween goody bags! Just know that when you buy this Item they 250 individual sour kid gummies not pouches!
customer_reviews.author: Jas

customer_reviews.title: Too many defective candies.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my daughters birthday party and I was very disappointed to find about 1/3 of the candies were unwrapped or had an open wrapper.
customer_reviews.author: Cristal

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY WHAT YOU ORDER!!
customer_reviews.text: This box is huge , the candy is individual pieces of candy wrapped on their own and they are so cute. This is a simple purchase which means you get EXACTLY what you order and they were fresh and good, great for handing out for Halloween or adding to treat bags.
customer_reviews.author: Arieal S Jones

customer_reviews.title: These are a winner at the office!
customer_reviews.text: The Sour Patch Kids are great - they have a great sour punch when they first hit your taste buds! I work in a hospital, and I bought these to put in my office for any of the employees to snack on, and they were an instant hit. I am ordering more today, along with some of the watermelon flavored Sour Patch candies. Besides being a great little pick-me-up, these are individually wrapped, and that is a definite plus for me. I only have individually wrapped candy and gum in my office - so much better for everyone. Try thesee - I know they will be a hit in your office, too.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Cline

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I did some price-comparing to see where I could find the best price... this was it. Ordered for a donation to my son's classroom.
customer_reviews.author: oneboyonegirl

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this candy
customer_reviews.text: The candy is fresh and good but it seems wasteful to wrap each candy individually instead of a few in each package.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sides

customer_reviews.title: Stocked up for awhile!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these twice and haven't been disapointed, once. No issues! As for the people complaning that they're individully wrapped... buy your dirty ass candy from the bulk section at the grocery store and shut up.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Sour Patch Kid fans, this is worth getting
customer_reviews.text: I keep ordering this because I'm a huge fan of the Sour Patch Kids line. It's individually wrapped so it's great for sharing with friends/family/coworkers/students/etc. But most important, it stays fresh. You don't know how many times I buy a bag of Sour Patch Kids at a grocery store only to get a bag of melted kids. I bought three of these already and all of them are fresh and not melted. Plus the big size is the perfect size. I would recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: E. Yee

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great Easter basket filler. Did 4 baskets and had plenty left over
customer_reviews.author: heather millswood

customer_reviews.title: cute little single wrapped candies!!
customer_reviews.text: Packed full!!! Im so excited to put candles in my orders!!
customer_reviews.author: Maeya Arnhold @ Gorge-Us Designs

customer_reviews.title: SOUR PATCH CANDIES? PERFECT SNACK...
customer_reviews.text: The individualized packaging is perfect! Perfect to give as the children are going home after school👌
customer_reviews.author: Meekie

customer_reviews.title: Sour patch kids... enough said
customer_reviews.text: Do I even need to say anything? If you’re going to but sour patch kids... buy these, they’re great and the packaging is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: KAM

customer_reviews.title: Party
customer_reviews.text: These are even better then the small ones. They come individually wrapped which is perfect for a party
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and super fresh
customer_reviews.text: Got these to give to kids for Halloween along with air heads and sour punch twists. I saved some for myself and they are really good. Tons of blue ones. If I would have gotten these for Halloween I would have loved them. I will mostly likely buy them again to snack on. They aren't stale at all either which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin C Munger

customer_reviews.title: Not the small 'kids' these are BIG and bigger than what I'm used to. Individual wrap good for sharing, bad for wasting plastic.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. These gummies are large than the standard 'kids' at about 1.5 inches tall each. They taste great, the only downside is how much plastic wrap is wasted for each individually wrapped gummy.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good but...
customer_reviews.text: Good candy but individually wrapped. Slightly larger than normal sour patch. So u would need to open like 15 or 20 single sour patch kids to be the amount of one normal bag. It leads to a lot of wasted time and a lot of extra trash. Them being larger makes much more of a gummy bear taste and less of the sour powder on the candies.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Love these things!
customer_reviews.text: I love the sour zap they give me. Not just for kids, candy!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: All individually wrapped.
customer_reviews.text: I love sour patch kida and once again i failed tr o read the description on this one. The are large ones and individually wrapped. Still delicious though.
customer_reviews.author: Mica B

customer_reviews.title: A lot of candy at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: It was really worth it for the price! There is a lot of candy for the price. The size of the candy is just right for a candy table.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved it! I love the size of it. One of rhem is just right for a treat!
customer_reviews.author: Sevde

customer_reviews.title: Stale!!!!👎👎
customer_reviews.text: You get one Sour Patch Kid in each plastic wrapper they are so stale you might lose a tooth
customer_reviews.author: Ron &Dana

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Got these to stuff a piñata. They were fresh and tasty, love the individual wrapping for this purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: great for trunk or treats
customer_reviews.text: bought these last year also, great for Trunk or treating since it is individual wrapped
customer_reviews.author: Rj

customer_reviews.title: Individually wrapped
customer_reviews.text: Awesome container of individually wrapped candies. The only issue I had was that the bottom of the box had lots of loose sugar, risking attracting critters.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Donn

customer_reviews.title: I use to be able to go into corner stores and buy candy like this for 5 cents (1 piece)
customer_reviews.text: When I was a kid growing up in New York City (Queens). I use to be able to go into corner stores and buy candy like this for 5 cents (1 piece). Scrolling upon this and seeing that I could buy it made me feel like a big kid again. Im long away from NYC now but every few years I visit, I always go and ge some of these as well as the other similar candy products.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Great For Valentines
customer_reviews.text: Got this product to pass out to children at school. They love it
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Very popular
customer_reviews.text: These are so popular with my students and colleagues that I can hardly keep them stocked.
customer_reviews.author: s overton

customer_reviews.title: Go big or go home, right?
customer_reviews.text: Brought these for a weekend event with a group - very convenient having each individually wrapped so people could grab a handful on the way out the door. And who doesn't smile at a huge box of Sour Patch Kids sitting on the table, even if you don't eat them. :) The variety of flavors seemed pretty even, not all reds with one blue or anything, and they tasted fresh.
customer_reviews.author: HRW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gift bags
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for candy leis I made. All the pieces came intact and individually wrapped. I don’t know why others say that some came outside of their wrapper
customer_reviews.author: Fashionflwer

customer_reviews.title: Tons of candy
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge box of candy. Great for filling birthday goody bags.
customer_reviews.author: bevasnaps

customer_reviews.title: Individually wrapped
customer_reviews.text: Big hit with my students. Individually wrapped so they’re good for group settings.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Repeated customer, I keep these on my desk and all my employees love them! Individually wrapped. For my I like the smaller sour patch kids better but the majority love these big ones!
customer_reviews.author: Bryee

product_meta.title: SOUR PATCH KIDS Big Individually Wrapped Soft & Chewy Candy, 240 Count
product_meta.description: SOUR PATCH KIDS Big Individually Wrapped Soft & Chewy Candy doubles up on fun and flavor. This delicious SOUR THEN SWEET candy comes in assorted fruit flavors to delight your taste buds, and the large kid-shaped pieces are two times bigger than the original for even more of a SOUR THEN SWEET treat. Serve this fat free candy at parties or holidays, or use the individually wrapped candy for brown bag lunches, party favors or holiday treats. Each soft candy is sealed in plastic packaging to ensure it stays soft, chewy and fresh until you bite into it.
feature_bullets: One 240 count package of SOUR PATCH KIDS Big Individually Wrapped Soft & Chewy Candy
SOUR THEN SWEET assorted candy in various fruit flavors
Soft and chewy candy is two times bigger than the original for a fun twist
Offer individually wrapped candy for Halloween, parties and brown bag lunches

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
